name: Dino Dungeon
description:
This game was created for IGDA Sweden 2021 Summer Game Jam

It is a fantasy dungeon crawler with dinosaurs and a hint of summer-themed music and environments. 

WASD - move

WASD + RMB - dash

LMB - attack

E - Equip/Open

Spacebar - use consumable

Aim with cursor

Kill enemies to find the exit, select the best upgrades, kill the boss!
